windows.title: Messenger/Monitor Release Rollout Checklist - Google Docs

uiElements.details: editing toolbar visible with options for editing text, adding comments, and viewing document history.

content.title: Monitor Release Rollout Checklist
content.visibleText:
1. Checklist for Monitor Release Rollout

1.1. Ensure all monitors are calibrated correctly with the latest firmware updates.
1.2. Verify that all cables and connections are secure and functioning properly.
1.3. Conduct a final review with the engineering team to ensure all specifications are met.
1.4. Schedule a deployment time with IT to minimize disruptions during business hours.
1.5. Prepare a backup plan in case of unforeseen issues during the rollout.
1.6. Document all steps taken and ensure all team members have access to the documentation.
1.7. Hold a pre-rollout meeting to discuss any potential issues or concerns.
1.8. Ensure customer support is briefed and ready to handle any inquiries post-rollout.
1.9. Review and update the documentation as necessary based on feedback from the rollout.
1.10. Celebrate the successful rollout with the team.

content.title: 2023 BAMM!ES Awards Ceremony
content.visibleText:
2023 BAMM!ES Awards Ceremony
Celebrating its 10th anniversary this year, the BAMM!ES Awards recognize outstanding customer advocacy in the software industry. Winners were announced at a glamorous gala during which various award ceremonies were held to honor exceptional customer advocacy in the software industry.

This 2023 event showcased:
- Best Customer Advocacy Program
- Best Customer Engagement Strategy
- Best Customer Experience
- Best Customer Support
- Best Customer Success Team
- Best Customer Advocacy Community
- Best Customer Engagement Platform
- Best Customer Experience Management
- Best Customer Support Software
- Best Customer Success Platform
